alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 9:06AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...BRIEF PERIODS OF STRONG GUSTY WINDS EXPECTED UNTIL NOON THIS MORNING... Travelers on Interstate 80 between Mile Markers 240 and 290, and Mile Markers 325 and 340, should expect occasionally strong wind gusts of 50 to 60 mph this morning. These stronger gusts will create some drifting and blowing snow on area roadways, but these conditions should be localized. Winds will likely stay elevated through this afternoon with the highest gusts weakening slightly through the afternoon. If traveling, please use caution and be prepared for sudden wind gusts and patchy blowing snow.

area.areaDesc: North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range
